Posts.EditableText: I've never really even tried saving games before. Just dabbling in a few games. I've tried saving, but it seems to not be working. I save, start the same game after, then everything starts over again with no save, nor asking whether to load or save. I've heard that other people are having the same problem. Will this be fixed? At least we can play games now. =/
Posts.HTML: I've never really even tried saving games before. Just dabbling in a few games. I've tried saving, but it seems to not be working. I save, start the same game after, then everything starts over again with no save, nor asking whether to load or save. I've heard that other people are having the same problem. Will this be fixed? Posts.EditableText: Once you've saved, if you're logged in, refresh the game listing page. There should be a new "continue" button next to the "play online" one, but you might have to refresh the page before it appears.
Posts.HTML: Once you've saved, if you're logged in, refresh the game listing page. There should be a new "continue" button next to the "play online" one, but you might have to refresh the page before it appears.
